hero.title: Expert Plumbing Solutions You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Licensed master plumbers providing residential and commercial plumbing services. From emergency repairs to complete remodels, water heater installations to drain cleaning‚Äîwe handle it all with professionalism, quality workmanship, and upfront pricing.

items.description: 24/7 emergency response. Includes trip charge and first hour of labor. No overtime fees!

items.description: Specialized services for restaurants: grease traps, commercial fixtures, health code compliance. Call for quote.

items.description: Complete bathroom plumbing for remodels. Includes new fixtures, drains, supply lines, and testing.

items.name: Sump Pump Installation
items.description: Sump pump installation with basin, discharge line, and backup battery system

about.title: About Blue Wave Plumbing
about.body: Family-owned since 2009, Blue Wave Plumbing has built a reputation for honest, reliable plumbing services. Our team of licensed master plumbers brings decades of combined experience and a commitment to quality workmanship. We're available 24/7 for emergencies, and we stand behind every job with industry-leading warranties and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
about.subtitle: Why choose us

items.text: Had a burst pipe at 2am and Blue Wave was here within an hour! Professional, efficient, and fixed it perfectly. Their no-overtime policy saved me a fortune. Highly recommend!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.text: We've been members for 3 years and love the peace of mind. The annual inspections caught small issues before they became expensive problems. Great value and excellent service!
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: Installed a tankless water heater and couldn't be happier! The team was professional, clean, and thorough. Explained everything and the price was very fair. Excellent work!
items.author: Jennifer Martinez

members.name: John Williams
members.title: Owner & Master Plumber
members.bio: John founded Blue Wave with a vision for honest, reliable plumbing services. With 22 years of experience and a master plumber license, he leads our team with expertise and integrity.

members.name: David Martinez
members.title: Lead Plumber
members.bio: David specializes in complex repairs and commercial plumbing. His problem-solving skills and attention to detail ensure every job is done right.

members.name: Tom Anderson
members.title: Service Plumber
members.bio: Tom handles residential service and repairs with a focus on customer satisfaction. His friendly demeanor and expertise make him a customer favorite.

emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency Plumbing
emergency.subtitle: We're here when you need us most
emergency.description: Plumbing emergencies don't wait for business hours. Our emergency team is available 24/7/365 with no overtime charges! We guarantee response within 60 minutes for all emergency calls.

contact.title: Schedule Service Today
contact.subtitle: Free estimates on all non-emergency work

items.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency service?
items.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7/365 emergency plumbing service with guaranteed response within 60 minutes. Best of all, we don't charge overtime fees‚Äîemergency rates are the same as regular rates!

items.question: Are you licensed and insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. All our plumbers are licensed (Master Plumber License #PL-98765), and we carry $2M in liability insurance and workers' compensation coverage.

items.question: Do you provide free estimates?
items.answer: Yes, we provide free estimates for all non-emergency work. For emergency service calls, there's a $195 service call fee that includes diagnosis and the first hour of labor.

items.question: What's included in your membership plans?
items.answer: Our membership plans include annual inspections, discounts on all repairs, priority scheduling, and more. The Total Protection plan is our most popular with 2 inspections per year, 20% off repairs, and free annual drain cleaning.

items.question: How quickly can you schedule non-emergency service?
items.answer: We typically can schedule non-emergency work within 1-2 business days. For urgent (but non-emergency) issues, we often have same-day availability.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve the entire metro area and surrounding communities. Check our service areas section or call to confirm we service your location.

items.question: Do you warranty your work?
items.answer: Yes! We provide warranties on all our work ranging from 90 days to 10 years depending on the service. All warranties are clearly explained before work begins.

items.question: Can you help with permits and inspections?
items.answer: Absolutely. We handle all necessary permits and coordinate inspections. Our work is always done to code, and we manage the entire permit process for you.
